nodes.text: Chinook Station was a fuel depot affiliated with the Galactic Empire, outfitting their forces with valuable tibanna gas. It was located on the planet Bespin.

Some time after the Battle of Endor, a number of Imperial-class Star Destroyers were stationed here to guard the fuel depots. A mission by members of Inferno Squad of the New Republic saw the destruction of these depots, as well as three Star Destroyers.
